full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA AER TE NI NO YON HO THOG THU BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN GYI GSOL 'DEBS NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026B (CES KHAL KHA AER TE SBA DUR GUNG SENG GE RDO RJE, RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I ZHABS GRAS AER TE NI SPI LIG THU THO YON ZHABS DRUNG TSE RING RDO RJE, KHU KHAN THUGS THA'I SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG MGON PO, RTZAS BZANG BLA MA BLO BZANG MGON PO, ,KHE YAR NGAR KHO TSE LDAN SKYABS SOGS NAS, BLA MA AER TE NI NO YON HO THOG THU BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL BSTAN 'DZIN GYI GSOL 'DEBS ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR RVA SGRENG AA CHI THU NO MON HAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
author_simple: AA CHI THU NO MON HAN,
